summary: Comprehensive testing of banquet hall management system completed. Backend APIs working excellently (14/15 tests passed). Frontend customer-facing features working well with proper bilingual support. Admin panel functional with minor authentication session issues.

minor_issues.issue: Test expected status 200 but got 401 for invalid credentials
minor_issues.impact: Test design issue, not API issue - API correctly rejects invalid credentials

authentication_issues.issue: Redirects to login page instead of showing bill form

form_interaction_issues.issue: Some form selectors not found in bill generation and settings

passed_tests: Landing page with 2 hall cards (Om Lawns & Shiv Lawns)
Hall card navigation to services pages
Check Dates navigation to booking calendar
Admin login with both credentials (om_admin/om123, shiv_admin/shiv123)
Services management page and Add Service modal
All backend APIs (halls, services, packages, shubh-dates, settings)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication session management for bill generation page. The page redirects to login instead of showing the bill form, suggesting session timeout or authentication flow issues. Also improve form selectors for better testability.
